haberman.rhizomatics.graphics

Class SoundThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.graphics.PathPaint
      • haberman.rhizomatics.graphics.SoundThread

  • public class SoundThread
extends PathPaint
    PathPaint subclass used to draw a thread of points (a list of PointF with the 0 index being the starting point).
